header.title: wxAcceleratorTable

description.p: An accelerator table allows the application to specify a table of keyboard shortcuts for menu or button commands.
The object ?wxNullAcceleratorTable is defined to be a table with no data, and is the initial accelerator table for a window.

Remark: An accelerator takes precedence over normal processing and can be a convenient way to program some event handling. For example, you can use an accelerator table to enable a dialog with a multi-line text control to accept CTRL-Enter as meaning 'OK'.

func.fsummary: Initializes the accelerator table from an array of wxAcceleratorEntry.

desc.p: Initializes the accelerator table from an array of wxAcceleratorEntry.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the accelerator table is valid.

desc.p: Returns true if the accelerator table is valid.
